title: Macron says 26 countries pledged troops to guarantee a ceasefire in Ukraine

Trump renames Department of Defense the 'Department of War'
subhead: The US president will sign an executive order permitting use of the Department of War as a 'secondary title' for the sprawling department, a White House document said, apparently due to its official name being set in law. Trump in recent weeks has said that he wanted to make such a shift, claiming the department's title was too 'defensive.'

title: France's Socialists present budget plan to navigate post-Bayrou era
subhead: The budget proposals put forward by the Socialists reveal a heightened sense of caution compared to previous left-wing estimates. They are intended to carry weight in upcoming discussions over the formation of a new government, ahead of Prime Minister François Bayrou's anticipated fall on Monday.

title: NATO: Europe is caught in Trump's 'protection racket'
subhead: The Europeans, eager to keep the US from abandoning Ukraine, waver between submission and emancipation. Yet for Trump, who doesn't heed political or moral arguments, NATO must, above all, pay off, writes Le Monde columnist Alain Frachon.

title: Sakurajima: Life in the shadow of the Japanese monster
subhead: 'Of Volcanoes and Men' (5/6). In southern Japan, Kagoshima's residents live under the constant threat of Sakurajima, one of the most active volcanoes in the archipelago. Photographer Chikashi Suzuki observed the city, with both fear and reverence, prepare for the volcano's next eruption.

subhead: The choice of a Wednesday for the planned September 10 protests raises questions about who has the option to strike, especially as labor disputes in French workplaces have been particularly rare in recent years.

title: Giorgio Armani, one of the makers of modern fashion, is dead
subhead: Creator, designer and stylist, he made the tailored suit into a status symbol. Armani, who reigned for more than 40 years over a veritable empire, died on Thursday, September 4, at the age of 91, his fashion house confirmed.

title: Thomas Piketty: 'To succeed in the climate transition, we must redistribute wealth differently'
subhead: In an interview with Le Monde, the French economist explains that protecting the planet from climate change cannot be achieved without reducing inequality.
